pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:0.5: 22. The training rule on bathing robes
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.2: At that time the Buddha had allowed bathing robes for the nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.4: Knowing this, the nuns from the group of six wore bathing robes that were inappropriate in size.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.5: As they were walking about, they were dragging them along, both from the front and from behind.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six wear such bathing robes?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns from the group of six do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.11: How can the nuns from the group of six wear inappropriately sized bathing robes?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:1.14: ‘If a nun is getting a bathing robe made, it should be made the right size. This is the right size: 2.4 meters long and 1.2 meters wide. If it exceeds that, it is to be cut down, and she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.2: wearing it as a sarong, she bathes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.4: making it herself or getting someone else to make it, it should be made the right size.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.5: This is the right size: 2.4 meters long and 1.2 meters wide.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.6: If she makes one or gets one made that exceeds that, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.7: When she obtains it, it is to be cut down, and she is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.8: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.9: If she gets others to finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.10: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.11: If she gets others to finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.12: If she makes one or gets one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.1.13: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.2: if she makes it the right size;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.3: if she makes it less than the right size;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.4: if she obtains one made by another that exceeds the right size and she cuts it down before using it;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.5: if she makes a canopy, a carpet, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc22:2.2.8: The second training rule is finished.
